ResourceHeader.Description: FGM (Flux Gate Magnetometer) is located on a 3.5 meter long boom and measures the magnetic field along the orbit at a rate up to 67 samples per second.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the FGM (Flux Gate Magnetometer) experiment on the Double Star 1 mission.
